title: Thanksgiving Recap
itunes:title: Thanksgiving Recap
description:
Dan Hanzus & Marc Sessler recap the Thanksgiving Day games, including the Bills big win over the Cowboys (4:25) and Jerry Jones’ postgame comments (10:55). The Heroes also break down the Lions loss to the Bears (14:55) and the Saints clinching the NFC South after their win over the Falcons (24:20).

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
